Text:
Y.W

Plan to upload the other Drizzt books i have and Cleric Quintet.
I miss Paths of Darkness and the Sellswords, if someone have those please upload =)

if you don't mind the hiss of cassette tape this is quite enjoyable.  I have only gotten through the first book so far, but the reader is pretty good, and the story is even better than I remember from when I was in junior high.
This will not start. Can somebody please seed?

I just finished these and made a copy for my dad.  Thank you for taking the time and posting these.  The hiss is just because it's from a tape recording.  Ugh, who buys unabridged CDs for audiobook?  You'd be switching every hour.  These are fantastic.
I own this trilogy, and i recommend it to anyone, i swear, R.A. Salvatore is probably the best writer in history, i love his writings.
Ares- Thank you for putting salvatore audio books on here. I love salvatore's books. If not for his books id still be a junky.
